Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.menu.MenuBase
com.comp2042.menu.MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuInterface
public class MainMenu extends MenuBase implements MenuInterface
MainMenu class implementing OOP principles for software maintenance coursework. OOP Concepts Applied: 1. Encapsulation: Private fields and methods, controlled access via public methods 2. Inheritance: Extends MenuBase abstract class 3. Polymorphism: Implements MenuInterface, overrides abstract methods 4. Abstraction: Uses abstract MenuBase class and MenuInterface
Author:
Student - Software Maintenance Course
